data.title: A Top Site Salvo + Drone Execute
data.description: Make it extremely difficult for Defenders to play on site at A with this combination of utility.

data.title: A Main Door Salvo Fight
data.description: Set up an unpredictable play towards Sands and Door with this Salvo lineup, it is recommended to coordinate with teammates here.

data.title: B Site Armageddon Clear Tower
data.description: Force Defenders to give up site or take an unfavorable, aggressive fight towards B Site.

data.title: B Drone + Delivery Combos Execute
data.description: Depending on what your Drone sees, use your Special Deliery to stun Defenders on site.
